th.name: patient_num
th.desc: A unique number assigned to each patient in DataWarehouse

th.name: status_update_date
th.desc: Date the CPS patient enrollment status was last updated (trigger field for this table)

th.name: pt_enroll_status
th.desc: Patient enrollment status as of the status update date

th.name: program_name
th.desc: Name of the CPS program that triggered this message in workflow

th.name: program_tag
th.desc: Tag to help identify the Program

th.name: program_type
th.desc: Type of clinical program such as Self-Directed Program or Vendor Program

th.name: enroll_type
th.desc: Type of enrollments allowed in this program such as Patient Enrollment or No Enrollment

th.name: program_num
th.desc: A unique key assigned to this program within CPS

th.name: patient_status_num
th.desc: A unique key assigned to this patient for this program
